comment._content: A bit of a Con, really! Before (or during?) the conversion from stables - opened 06/03/1916 - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sydney_Conservatorium_of_Music

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] During the conversion seems like a good theory! According to this article the conversion was going "full speed ahead" in July 1913 -although not without controversy by the sounds of things: trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15438846?searchTerm=cons... stables&searchLimits= -AG
